# @opensourceframework/next-auth - AI Summary

## Package Overview
- **Package:** @opensourceframework/next-auth
- **Version:** v3.29.11
- **Forked from:** next-auth (original: nextauthjs/next-auth)
- **Purpose:** Complete authentication solution for Next.js applications

## Key Capabilities

### Authentication Providers
- OAuth 1.0, 1.0A, and 2.0 support
- Built-in providers for Google, Apple, GitHub, Facebook, Twitter, etc.
- Email/passwordless authentication
- Custom provider implementation

### Session Management
- JSON Web Tokens (JWT)
- Database sessions (Prisma, TypeORM, MongoDB, etc.)
- Session synchronization across tabs/windows

### Security Features
- CSRF protection
- Secure cookie policies
- JWS signing with HS512 (configurable)
- JWT encryption (JWE) support

## Modernization Updates
- Full App Router support
- Next.js 16/17 compatibility
- React 19 hydration fixes
- TypeScript type definitions maintained
- tsup-based build system

## Installation
```bash
npm install @opensourceframework/next-auth
# or
pnpm add @opensourceframework/next-auth
```

## Migration from Original
Replace `next-auth` with `@opensourceframework/next-auth` in your dependencies.
All existing APIs are compatible with the v3.x series.

## Use Cases
- Legacy v3 applications that cannot migrate to v5
- Projects requiring full control over authentication
- Applications needing OAuth + database session support
